definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: plummet (cf. words in cogn. lang. for lead, tin, etym. dub., perh. foreign; Ar. 0’a0nukun (v. Frä:153) Syr. 0anho0 Mand. [[אנכא]], As. anâku Lyon:Sargontexte 92; v. Lag:Arm. Stud. § 103 cf. Id. BN 175)—[[אֲנָ֑ךְ]] exc. once Am 7:8—plummet Am 7:7, Am 7:8, Am 7:8; ´[[חֶוֹמַת א]] i.e. a vertical wall v:Am 7:7.
